forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 59, with temperatures falling to around 56 in the afternoon. West northwest wind around 14 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Clear, with a low around 46. Northwest wind 6 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph.

weather_report:
In Downtown San Francisco, the afternoon unfolds under a clear canopy of bright blue skies, inviting both warmth and a gentle breeze. As the temperature hovers near sixty, you can expect a dip to a refreshing forty-six come nightfall, with the winds whispering around fourteen mph, a delightful preamble to the cool evening. The absence of fog reveals an unobstructed view toward the iconic Golden Gate, the horizon shimmering magnificently in this clarity, accented by the occasional playful puff of cloud scudding across the sky.

With the day unfolding favorably, it’s an ideal time for an uneventful stroll along the Embarcadero, where one might pause to enjoy a coffee while gazing out over the bay, its placid waters reflecting the sun’s golden touch. A light sweater or a windbreaker would be wise as you step outside, ensuring comfort against the crisp air. Whether you're exploring hidden corners of the city or simply relishing the tranquility of a park, this afternoon offers a serene simplicity perfect for unwinding, contemplating, or simply being.
